title: ‘Monster’ Under Bed Was Wanted Fugitive
text:
A Kansas babysitter found a man hiding under a child’s bed after the child said a “monster” was there. When she checked, she came face-to-face with 27-year-old Martin Villalobos Jr., who fled after knocking over her and the child.

Deputies arrested him the next day after a foot chase. Villalobos, who used to live on the property, had a protection order barring him from the home. He now faces charges including aggravated kidnapping and child endangerment.

He is being held in Barton County Jail on $500,000 bond.

images.title: Blake, Wm. Vanni Fucci Making Figs Against God. 1824.
